statement.p: Find the perimeter and area of the parallelogram above. Side lengths are measurements.

solution.p: Perimeter is the sum of the sides: \displaystyle{2}{\left({6.97}+{7.7}\right)}={29.34}\approx{29.34}.
Area is height times base (side perpendicular to height): \displaystyle{7.7}\cdot{6.88}={52.976}\approx{53}.
